# init

**Instance Method**

Initializes the memory map object.

## Declaration

```swift
bool init();
```

## Return Value

`true` if initialization was successful, or `false` if it was unsuccessful.

## Discussion

Don’t call this method directly. To create a memory map object, call the [doc://com.apple.driverkit/documentation/DriverKit/IOMemoryDescriptor/CreateMapping] method of [doc://com.apple.driverkit/documentation/DriverKit/IOMemoryDescriptor].

## Configuring the Memory Map

- **free**: Performs any final cleanup for the memory map object.
